item.description:
Prayer and Meditation are ways to get in touch with your higher self. And, creating a habit is key to continued success. The clients and students of the meetup and the HSCC are invited to attend weekly meditation classes to assist in createing a premanent schedule for meditation at the Center.

Classes wiill begin at 6am, 7am and 8am. The doors will open 10 miuntes prior to the class start for fee collection and directions to the class are. There will be no entry after the class starts on the hour. All classes will be 40-45 minutes. There will be distinctly different meditations held for each class, there will be themes and all programs will address breathing and keeping the mind clear therefore allowing for deeper relaxation and leading to clearer vizualizations.

The amount of classes beinging offered will continue through the month of January and at the end of January the more popular times and days will continue throughout the rest of the year.

Please join us and support the time and day that you would like to see continued. Please address any questions to Barb Tremlett the instructor. Each class has a fee of $10, all charge cards payments will be $12.00 per class.

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Basic Meditation Class- All levels 6am,7am,8am, M_W_F for January
